title: Square Enix Sells Crystal Dynamics, Tomb Raider, and More - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.02.22
description:
Blessing and Tim discuss a HUGE acquisition. Embracer Group has acquired Crystal Dynamics, Eidos Montreal, Tomb Raider, Deus Ex, and more for $300 Million.

Time Stamps -
﻿00:00:00 - Start
00:01:05 - Housekeeping

Eid Mubarak to all celebrating!

ICYMI: There’s a new Kinda Funny Xcast up right now breaking down what to expect from Xbox’s Games Showcase coming up in June. That features the one and only Benji Sales. That’s p on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.

The Roper Report  -

00:02:32 - Embracer Group is acquiring Eidos, Crystal Dynamics, and Square Enix Montreal
00:27:43 - Ads
00:30:40 - Warner Bros Games could soon be for sale
00:43:44 - Now PlayStation is also hiring for an acquisitions manager
00:49:25 - Nintendo Switch Sports smashes to No.1 in the UK
00:52:04 - Out today
00:52:35 - “Why weren’t the major Switch Sports reviews labeled “reviews in progress?”” - Casey
00:59:03 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Tim
